page.title: 01Preface - Rhagarweiniad.
page.content: The block covered is of a rural area, a small village of about 500 inhabitants.Sheep farming is the main industry.The flat lowland,the best agricultural land is protected by a sea wall.The tree covered hills rise steeply to the west of the village; the ground cleared is used for grazing.The mountains beyond-Y Rhinogau are unspoilt and are used for sheep grazing during the summer months Language - Welsh with increasing number of English speakers Employment-Farming,Tourist Industry. Culture - Traditional but reflecting a bilingual society. Tradition- Retained to a fair degree. Ecology - Remains unspoiled. Lifestyle- Mainly working class but shows a cross section of wealth. {Pp2-10 in Welsh,see pp11-12 for trans.
